subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets scored 69 first-half points and then lost a 24-point lead on the way to a victory over the Pacers, their final playoff-caliber opponent of the regular season.
snippet: The Nets scored 69 first-half points and then lost a 24-point lead on the way to a victory over the Pacers, their final playoff-caliber opponent of the regular season.
